explains: vt. 在法庭相争；提出诉讼

sentences.en: If we have to litigate, we will.
sentences.cn: 如果我们必须提起诉讼的话，我们会的。

sentences.en: The new law also grants them the right to litigate.
sentences.cn: 新法授予他们提起诉讼的权利。

sentences.en: The new law also grants them the right to litigate .
sentences.cn: 新法还赋予它们提出诉讼的权利。
